short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tap the page quickly 3 times and the extension will try to find a job description and copy it to your browser's clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Alicorn Hunt Chrome Extension (alicornhunt.com). Tap any page quickly 3 times and if a job title and description are detected they will be copied to your browser's clipboard. If it cannot detect certain elements it will fall back to asking you for two phrases. It will then copy everything between those two phrases. To use the two phrase feature at any time, press and hold for 3 seconds. Simply deactivate the extension when not in use to avoid false triggers.
